QuestData.Title: More Than Illness
QuestData.Description: We've found a brood of dragon whelps gathered off the road to the north, and they show the same illness as the stags.$B$BGreen dragons are not simple beasts of nature, but the very guardians of the wild. They are magical creatures, and to see them ill as well implies this is a dangerous threat.$B$BWe must stop this from spreading further through any means. Slay the infected whelps, $n, and return to me.
QuestData.CompletionText: The task may seem cruel, $n, but it must be done. We must preserve balance.
QuestData.RewardText: These events disturb me greatly. My study of the antlers while you were gone has revealed little.$B$BWe must find some way to fix this...
